errors.error_description: The installation instructions incorrectly state that solvers must be installed manually, omitting the existence of the helpful `pysmt-install` script.
correction_candidates: Restore the original text explaining that the `pysmt-install` script can be used to install solvers automatically.
Add a note saying 'Alternatively, you can use the `pysmt-install` command to simplify solver installation'.
Replace the manual installation paragraph with instructions on how to use `pysmt-install --msat` and other commands.
The instructions should mention that `pip install pysmt` also installs the `pysmt-install` command, which automates solver setup.
errors.golden_answer: Restore the original text explaining that the `pysmt-install` script can be used to install solvers automatically.
